Explore Common Questions

We have four single-apartment floors, offering a total of four individual apartments. Each floor features one private apartment designed for comfort and relaxation.

Yes, you can book an apartment for a single night stay. Our cozy and private apartments are perfect for short getaways as well as extended stays.

Each apartment at Cottage Home Belihuloya is equipped with all the necessary amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. This includes cozy bedding, modern facilities, and a peaceful environment to help you relax and unwind.

Our guests have given Cottage Home Belihuloya excellent ratings, praising the comfort of the apartments, the serene location, and the overall hospitality. Many guests highlight their enjoyable and memorable experiences, making our cottage a highly recommended destination.

About Us

Welcome to Cottage Home Belihuloya, a charming retreat nestled in a serene location. Our cottage features four unique single-apartment floors, each offering a cozy and private space for guests to unwind. Whether you're looking for a peaceful night's stay or a longer getaway, our apartments are designed to provide comfort and relaxation. With excellent customer ratings, Cottage Home Belihuloya is the perfect destination to enjoy a tranquil escape and create lasting memories. Book your stay with us and experience the warmth and hospitality that our guests rave about.
